executiveSummary:
Artisan Home Goods has built a loyal customer base through exceptional product curation and customer service. However, your current e-commerce platform is limiting growth and creating operational inefficiencies. This proposal outlines a comprehensive platform modernization that will increase conversion rates, streamline operations, and position Artisan Home Goods for scalable growth.

Our approach combines proven technology (Shopify Plus) with custom development to create a platform that reflects your brand while delivering the performance your business needs. The project will be completed in 16 weeks with minimal disruption to your current operations.
problemStatement:
Based on our discovery conversations, Artisan Home Goods faces several challenges with the current platform:

- **Conversion Rate**: Currently 1.8% vs. industry average of 2.5-3.0%
- **Mobile Experience**: Mobile bounce rate of 65% indicates poor mobile optimization
- **Inventory Management**: Manual synchronization between online and retail locations
- **Page Load Speed**: Average 6.2s on mobile (target: <3s)
- **Integration Limitations**: Unable to connect with new vendors and fulfillment partners

solution.overview: We propose a complete platform migration to Shopify Plus, enhanced with custom applications for your unique business requirements. This solution provides enterprise-grade infrastructure with the flexibility to customize the customer experience and back-end operations.

features.title: Custom Storefront
features.description: A fast, mobile-first storefront built with Hydrogen (Shopify's headless framework) that reflects the Artisan brand while delivering sub-2-second load times.

features.title: Unified Inventory
features.description: Real-time inventory synchronization across e-commerce, retail POS, and warehouse management systems, eliminating oversells and manual reconciliation.

features.title: Personalized Shopping
features.description: AI-powered product recommendations and personalized collections based on browsing behavior, purchase history, and customer preferences.

features.title: B2B Portal
features.description: Dedicated wholesale ordering portal with custom pricing, net terms, and streamlined reordering for your retail partners.
